title: datalad get from S3 within matlab with env var credentials is not working
body:
I can get content from normal dataset from web without auth:

```
>> !datalad clone https://github.com/datalad-datasets/longnow-podcasts.git podcasts
[INFO   ] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore                        
install(ok): /tmp/podcasts (dataset)                                                         
>> !datalad -C podcasts get Long_Now__Conversations_at_The_Interval/2017_06_09__How_Digital_Memory_Is_Shaping_Our_Future__Abby_Smith_Rumsey.mp3
get(ok): Long_Now__Conversations_at_The_Interval/2017_06_09__How_Digital_Memory_Is_Shaping_Our_Future__Abby_Smith_Rumsey.mp3 (file) [from web...]
```

but not from S3 with auth:

```
>> system('datalad clone https://github.com/datalad-datasets/hcp-functional-connectivity.git mytest')
[INFO   ] Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore                        
install(ok): /tmp/mytest (dataset)                                                           

ans =

     0

>> system('datalad -C mytest get 100206/T1w/T1w_acpc_dc.nii.gz')

[WARNING] Running get resulted in stderr output: [INFO] Downloading 's3://hcp-openaccess/HCP_1200/100206/T1w/T1w_acpc_dc.nii.gz?versionId=aQZQQ3CKTZLooTElbyQgXtIkPmlXIan1' into '.git/annex/tmp/MD5E-s71281037--b62438a3bd3ef0f78f7c24562ba1f1bf.nii.gz' 
[INFO] S3 session: Connecting to the bucket hcp-openaccess with authentication 
[INFO] Downloading 's3://hcp-openaccess/HCP_1200/100206/T1w/T1w_acpc_dc.nii.gz?versionId=aQZQQ3CKTZLooTElbyQgXtIkPmlXIan1' into '.git/annex/tmp/MD5E-s71281037--b62438a3bd3ef0f78f7c24562ba1f1bf.nii.gz' 
[INFO] S3 session: Connecting to the bucket hcp-openaccess with authentication 
[INFO] Downloading 's3://hcp-openaccess/HCP_1200/100206/T1w/T1w_acpc_dc.nii.gz?versionId=aQZQQ3CKTZLooTElbyQgXtIkPmlXIan1' into '.git/annex/tmp/MD5E-s71281037--b62438a3bd3ef0f78f7c24562ba1f1bf.nii.gz' 
[INFO] S3 session: Connecting to the bucket hcp-openaccess with authentication 
git-annex: get: 1 failed
 
[ERROR  ] from datalad...; from datalad...; from datalad...; Unable to access these remotes: datalad; Try making some of these repositories available:;      5435893f-9dce-4098-98ec-82d825391bbd -- [datalad]; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin) [get(/tmp/mytest/100206/T1w/T1w_acpc_dc.nii.gz)] 
get(error): 100206/T1w/T1w_acpc_dc.nii.gz (file) [from datalad...; from datalad...; from datalad...; Unable to access these remotes: datalad; Try making some of these repositories available:;   5435893f-9dce-4098-98ec-82d825391bbd -- [datalad]; ; (Note that these git remotes have annex-ignore set: origin)]

ans =

     1

```

I have credentials defined in the session that runs matlab:

```
% export DATALAD_hcp_s3_key_id=AKIAX...
% export DATALAD_hcp_s3_secret_id=zyJ...
```

Running the exact same commands in shell works fine, on the same machine, in the same session. I confirmed that the shell that is spawned by matlab sees the env vars. And doing something like this doesn't work either:

```
!datalad -C mytest get 100206/T1w/ < /dev/null
```
